comment: Dr. Zimmermann although tough, is a really great professor! I enjoyed his lectures, as well as his somewhat laid back attitude; but DO NOT take this for granted. He is also very challenging, but fair. I appreciated the feedback on my papers and the opportunity that he gave me to receive a better grade. I would take any class with him!
I think he's a great professor.  I enjoyed his lectures, don't think he's a bit boring.

I would like to say that I was also one of the students in this class in fear of failing. I have no advise to offer, but one thing I will say is that the entire final grade is curved. Yes the whole class was "failing" but curves are meant to pass a percentage.Nice man, if you need help go to his office, he can talk for hours.

Nice and funny professor but strays of topic constantly during his lectures. Will make time to meet with him to discuss test questions after class. Very difficult to get and A in this class as test questions are sometimes confusing. Gives study guides and extra credit.

Mr. Zimmermann was helpful when going after class to see him for help, but I did not like his teaching style. He just lectures and you're expected to remember everything he says. his tests are not very easy. He gives out study guides, but its not enough to pass his tests with an A or B

most awful teacher ever. i warn you STAY AWAY FAR AWAY. im an A+ student. I hate lazy students,usually ppl who fail deserve it BUT not here. his class was impossible. i barely got a C. and for me thats awful. impossible tests. painfully boring lectures. rude man. stay far far away from this class! take ANYONE else.

Your grade is basically based on how much random political knowledge you have. His lectures have nothing to do with the exams and the book doesn't help either. The questions are RANDOM and loosely based on his study guides. Cool guy but terrible prof.

the test grades in this class are SO low. he claims that someone made a 90 percent but that was in the entire history of the existence of this course.  We are all scared and hopeless. DONT TAKE THIS CLASS!!!!!! and ratemyprofessor is starting to make me doubt the ratings because this is the second teacher with a good rating that is NOT!!!!
Everyone just got their tests back and everyone FAILED. the highest grade was like a 75. His lectures made no sense and do not help on the test! Also, the book is completely useless for the test.

90% of your grade is based on three exams. The other 10% is based on an essay. His lectures are a joke. He simply stands in front of the class and rants. It is impossible to tell what is info you need and what is just useless knowledge. He doesnt prepare you for the tests at all. You simply have to guess at what will be on them.

Dear Dr. Zimmermann, you are the most knowledgeable professor so far. We learn a lot from you and your course. You are so kind and nice to us. As well you can understand our special situation. Thank you what you have done for us. The winter vocation is coming. We all hope that you and your wife can enjoy the wonderful vocation,all love u so much```
He is so knowledgeable and confident. I love love love his class.

Very professional and knowlegeable and helps us a lot, especially his materials. And he is very kind and nice to us!!! We all enjoy his class so much, we love you forever! We also hope to chat with you next semester~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
He is really knowlegeable and confident to answer any queation. He is one of the best professors I have ever met.
great prof, great discussions. no tests just essays and group presentations. take him, you will enjoy the class

Dr. Zimmerman is great. His lectures are very clear and concise. Doesn't keep you in class the whole time unless it is necessary. Lots of writing, no tests. Average ammount of reading. Lots of in class group work. Great course and teacher. I recommend it.
